channel.description: Recent content in c on gingerBill

item.title: A Reply to _Let's stop copying C_
item.description: I read the article Let’s stop copying C about 3 years ago. Recently someone brought it up again and I thought I would comment on the points being made. The article argues that newer languages ought not to copy the mistakes of C and comment on may of C’s mistakes. I recommend reading the original article first before reading this one as I will be commenting directly on the subsections of the article.
